<!-- This file is generated by `packages/vite/scripts/gen-cli-docs.ts`. Do not edit. -->

# Command Line Interface

## Dev server

### `vite dev`

Start Vite dev server in the current directory.

#### Usage

```bash
vite dev [root]
```

#### Options

| Options                 | Type                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `-c, --config <file>`   | `string`                          | Use specified config file                                                                                                                                                            |
| `--base <path>`         | `string`                          | Public base path (default: /)                                                                                                                                                        |
| `-l, --logLevel`        | `error \| warn \| info \| silent` | Determine which logs to output.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `--clearScreen`         | `boolean`                         | Allow/disable clear screen when logging                                                                                                                                              |
| `--configLoader`        | `bundle \| runner \| native`      | use `bundle` to bundle the config with esbuild, or `runner` (experimental) to process it on the fly, or `native` (experimental) to load using the native runtime (default: `bundle`) |
| `-d, --debug [feat]`    | `string \| boolean`               | Show debug logs                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `-f, --filter <filter>` | `string`                          | Filter debug logs                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `-m, --mode <mode>`     | `string`                          | Set env mode                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--profile`             | `boolean`                         | Start built-in Node.js inspector (check [Performance bottlenecks](/guide/troubleshooting#performance-bottlenecks)                                                                    |
| `--host [host]`         | `string \| boolean`               | Specify hostname                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `--port`                | `number`                          | Specify port                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--open [path]`         | `string \| boolean`               | Open browser on startup                                                                                                                                                              |
| `--cors`                | `boolean`                         | Enable CORS                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `--strictPort`          | `boolean`                         | Exit if specified port is already in use                                                                                                                                             |
| `--force`               | `boolean`                         | Force the optimizer to ignore the cache and re-bundle                                                                                                                                |

#### Aliases

`vite`, `vite serve`

## Build

### `vite build`

Build for production.

#### Usage

```bash
vite build [root]
```

#### Options

| Options                 | Type                               | Description                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `-c, --config <file>`   | `string`                           | Use specified config file                                                                                                                                                            |
| `--base <path>`         | `string`                           | Public base path (default: /)                                                                                                                                                        |
| `-l, --logLevel`        | `error \| warn \| info \| silent`  | Determine which logs to output.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `--clearScreen`         | `boolean`                          | Allow/disable clear screen when logging                                                                                                                                              |
| `--configLoader`        | `bundle \| runner \| native`       | use `bundle` to bundle the config with esbuild, or `runner` (experimental) to process it on the fly, or `native` (experimental) to load using the native runtime (default: `bundle`) |
| `-d, --debug [feat]`    | `string \| boolean`                | Show debug logs                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `-f, --filter <filter>` | `string`                           | Filter debug logs                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `-m, --mode <mode>`     | `string`                           | Set env mode                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--profile`             | `boolean`                          | Start built-in Node.js inspector (check [Performance bottlenecks](/guide/troubleshooting#performance-bottlenecks)                                                                    |
| `--target <target>`     | `string`                           | Transpile target (default: 'modules')                                                                                                                                                |
| `--outDir <dir>`        | `string`                           | Output directory (default: dist)                                                                                                                                                     |
| `--assetsDir <dir>`     | `string`                           | Directory under outDir to place assets in (default: assets)                                                                                                                          |
| `--assetsInlineLimit`   | `number`                           | Static asset base64 inline threshold in bytes (default: 4096)                                                                                                                        |
| `--ssr [entry]`         | `string \| boolean`                | Build specified entry for server-side rendering                                                                                                                                      |
| `--sourcemap`           | `boolean \| "inline" \| "hidden"`  | Output source maps for build (default: false)                                                                                                                                        |
| `--minify`              | `boolean \| "terser" \| "esbuild"` | Enable/disable minification, or specify minifier to use (default: esbuild)                                                                                                           |
| `--manifest [name]`     | `string \| boolean`                | Emit build manifest json                                                                                                                                                             |
| `--ssrManifest [name]`  | `string \| boolean`                | Emit ssr manifest json                                                                                                                                                               |
| `--emptyOutDir`         | `boolean`                          | Force empty outDir when it's outside of root                                                                                                                                         |
| `-w, --watch`           | `boolean`                          | Rebuilds when modules have changed on disk                                                                                                                                           |
| `--app`                 | `boolean`                          | Same as `builder: {}`                                                                                                                                                                |

## Others

### `vite optimize`

Pre-bundle dependencies.

**Deprecated**: the pre-bundle process runs automatically and does not need to be called.

#### Usage

```bash
vite optimize [root]
```

#### Options

| Options                 | Type                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `-c, --config <file>`   | `string`                          | Use specified config file                                                                                                                                                            |
| `--base <path>`         | `string`                          | Public base path (default: /)                                                                                                                                                        |
| `-l, --logLevel`        | `error \| warn \| info \| silent` | Determine which logs to output.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `--clearScreen`         | `boolean`                         | Allow/disable clear screen when logging                                                                                                                                              |
| `--configLoader`        | `bundle \| runner \| native`      | use `bundle` to bundle the config with esbuild, or `runner` (experimental) to process it on the fly, or `native` (experimental) to load using the native runtime (default: `bundle`) |
| `-d, --debug [feat]`    | `string \| boolean`               | Show debug logs                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `-f, --filter <filter>` | `string`                          | Filter debug logs                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `-m, --mode <mode>`     | `string`                          | Set env mode                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--profile`             | `boolean`                         | Start built-in Node.js inspector (check [Performance bottlenecks](/guide/troubleshooting#performance-bottlenecks)                                                                    |
| `--force`               | `boolean`                         | Force the optimizer to ignore the cache and re-bundle                                                                                                                                |

### `vite preview`

Locally preview the production build. Do not use this as a production server as it's not designed for it.

#### Usage

```bash
vite preview [root]
```

#### Options

| Options                 | Type                              | Description                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `-c, --config <file>`   | `string`                          | Use specified config file                                                                                                                                                            |
| `--base <path>`         | `string`                          | Public base path (default: /)                                                                                                                                                        |
| `-l, --logLevel`        | `error \| warn \| info \| silent` | Determine which logs to output.                                                                                                                                                      |
| `--clearScreen`         | `boolean`                         | Allow/disable clear screen when logging                                                                                                                                              |
| `--configLoader`        | `bundle \| runner \| native`      | use `bundle` to bundle the config with esbuild, or `runner` (experimental) to process it on the fly, or `native` (experimental) to load using the native runtime (default: `bundle`) |
| `-d, --debug [feat]`    | `string \| boolean`               | Show debug logs                                                                                                                                                                      |
| `-f, --filter <filter>` | `string`                          | Filter debug logs                                                                                                                                                                    |
| `-m, --mode <mode>`     | `string`                          | Set env mode                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--profile`             | `boolean`                         | Start built-in Node.js inspector (check [Performance bottlenecks](/guide/troubleshooting#performance-bottlenecks)                                                                    |
| `--host [host]`         | `string \| boolean`               | Specify hostname                                                                                                                                                                     |
| `--port`                | `number`                          | Specify port                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `--strictPort`          | `boolean`                         | Exit if specified port is already in use                                                                                                                                             |
| `--open [path]`         | `string \| boolean`               | Open browser on startup                                                                                                                                                              |
| `--outDir <dir>`        | `string`                          | Output directory (default: dist)                                                                                                                                                     |
